title: Classical art meets modern-day medicine in Robert Winston lecture (University of Bristol)
text: ( Source : University of Bristol ) Professor Lord Robert Winston will be going back to classical times to see what lessons we can learn for modern-day medicine when he gives a public lecture at the University of Bristol. Lord Winston , known
